mapper.select: select * from (select *from (select R.*, rownum N from (select goods_num, title title2, img, rv_num, rv_writer, rv_contents, rv_score, to_char(rv_reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') rv_reg_date, rv_ex, rv_aname,to_char(rv_adate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rv_adate, rv_acontents from goods inner join review1 using(goods_num) order by rv_num desc) R) where N between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}) left outer join review_img using(rv_num)
select count(rv_num) from review1 inner join review_check on 1=1 where rv_reg_date > review_check.check_date
select R.*, G.img, G.title title2 from review1 inner join goods using(goods_num) where rv_num=#{rv_num}
